text:
Wondering aloud if some thought in 🇪🇺 will be given to #chloroquine if #COVID19 crisis continues to scale-up.

It is all over the media esp. in France 🇫🇷. Clinical trials in 🇨🇳.

Have read about possible allergies, side effects, etc.  But in a pinch, will one #EU country gamble? https://t.co/WkJHSuzwLk
